summary: The diff shows backend and frontend infrastructure changes to support fare breakdown (baseFare, taxes, serviceFees) and rate management, but does NOT contain actual real city names or real-world pricing data from RedBus or other booking platforms. All requirements remain unimplemented as the code only provides the structure to store such data, not the data itself.

missing_requirements.requirement: Replace placeholder city names with real city data from RedBus or similar booking platforms for all transport types
missing_requirements.reason: No evidence of real city names being added. The backend schema supports city storage (origin/destination fields exist), but no actual city data from RedBus, MakeMyTrip, or Goibibo is present in the diff.

missing_requirements.requirement: Update bus route pricing structure to reflect real RedBus fare data including base fare, taxes, and service fees
missing_requirements.reason: While the RateBreakdown structure (baseFare, taxes, serviceFees) is implemented, no actual RedBus pricing data is present. The implementation only provides the schema to store such data.

missing_requirements.requirement: Update train route pricing to use real-world fare data from booking platforms like IRCTC, MakeMyTrip
missing_requirements.reason: No real train fare data from IRCTC or other platforms is included. Only the structure to support fare breakdown exists.

missing_requirements.requirement: Update taxi pricing model to reflect real-world rates from booking platforms like Ola, Uber based on distance and vehicle type
missing_requirements.reason: No real taxi pricing data from Ola, Uber, or local taxi services is present. The vehicle multiplier logic exists but uses arbitrary values (1.5x for SUV, 2x for van) rather than actual market rates.

missing_requirements.requirement: Ensure all frontend displays correctly show the updated real city names and pricing for all transport types
missing_requirements.reason: Frontend components (RouteResultCard, RouteDetailPage, BookingSummary, AdminRoutesTable) are updated to display fare breakdowns, but since no real city names or real pricing data exist in the backend, they cannot display real data as required.
